name: BaseEventRegistry
description: BaseEventRegistry is the core event management system in JSMacros that handles all event registration, listener management, and event metadata.
overview: BaseEventRegistry is the core event management system in JSMacros that handles all event registration, listener management, and event metadata. This class serves as the foundation for JSMacros' event-driven architecture, managing how events are registered, which listeners respond to them, and how script triggers are processed. Note: This class is not directly accessible from JSMacros scripts. Instead, you interact with its functionality through the global JsMacros object methods like JsMacros.on(), JsMacros.off(), JsMacros.listeners(), etc. The BaseEventRegistry is responsible for: Event Registration: Maintaining a registry of all available events; Listener Management: Adding and removing event listeners; Script Trigger Management: Handling script-based event triggers from the configuration; Event Metadata: Tracking which events are cancellable, joinable, or filterable; Legacy Support: Managing event name mappings for backward compatibility.

methods.name: addListener
methods.description: Adds an event listener for a specific event.

parameters.name: event
parameters.description: The event name to listen for

methods.name: removeListener
getListeners
methods.description: Returns all listeners for all events.

methods.name: getListeners
methods.description: Returns all listeners for a specific event.

methods.name: addScriptTrigger
methods.description: Abstract method - implemented by concrete registry classes. Adds a script trigger from configuration to the event system.

methods.name: removeScriptTrigger
methods.description: Abstract method - implemented by concrete registry classes. Removes a script trigger from the event system.

methods.name: getScriptTriggers
methods.description: Abstract method - implemented by concrete registry classes. Gets all currently registered script triggers.

methods.name: addEvent
methods.description: Registers a new event with the system.

parameters.name: eventName
parameters.description: Name of the event to register

methods.name: addEvent
methods.description: Registers an event with joinable flag.

parameters.name: joinable
parameters.description: Whether the event can be joined

methods.name: addEvent
methods.signature: addEvent(String eventName, boolean joinable, boolean cancellable)
methods.description: Registers an event with both joinable and cancellable flags.

parameters.name: joinable
parameters.description: Whether the event can be joined

parameters.name: cancellable
parameters.description: Whether the event can be cancelled

methods.name: addEvent
methods.description: Registers an event using reflection and `@Event` annotation. This method automatically extracts event metadata from the `@Event` annotation: Event name from `value()`, Legacy name mapping from `oldName()`, Cancellable flag from `cancellable()`, Joinable flag from `joinable()`, Filterer from `filterer()`.

methods.name: clearMacros
methods.description: Removes all script-based listeners while keeping system listeners intact.
